languages.text: "Если леди Моллес-Секандас права, то ее дети — соучастники самозванца и виновны в клевете на достоверность документов Администратума". {n}Сейчас хладнокровия в Соломоне хватило бы на полк.{/n} "Сообщите этой женщине, что ее наследники должны разделить участь преступника, ибо того требует закон Императора".

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."
languages.original_text: "Если леди Моллес-Секандас права, то ее дети — соучастники самозванца и виновны в клевете на достоверность документов Администратума". {n}Сейчас хладнокровия в Соломоне хватило бы на полк.{/n} "Сообщите этой женщине, что ее наследники должны разделить участь преступника, ибо того требует закон Императора".

traits.locale_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of slandering the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's law."

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of slandering the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's law."

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's law."

"I say we are looking at an attempt to exploit the system for personal gain. Lady Molles deserves a punishment so severe that, a hundred years from now, it will still serve as a lesson to any who fancy themselves smarter than the Administratum."

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

"If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's law."

languages.text: "Wenn Lady Molles-Secundas recht hat, sind ihre Kinder die Komplizen des Hochstaplers und demzufolge schuldig, die Authentizität von Dokumenten des Administratums anzuzweifeln." {n}Mittlerweile ist Solomorne gelassen genug, etwas zu sagen.{/n} "Lasst die Frau wissen, dass ihre Erben dasselbe Schicksal erwartet wie den Kriminellen, denn so will es das Gesetz des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Lady Molles-Secundas recht hat, sind ihre Kinder die Komplizen des Hochstaplers und demzufolge schuldig, die Authentizität von Dokumenten des Administratums anzuzweifeln." {n}Mittlerweile ist Solomorne gelassen genug, etwas zu sagen.{/n} "Lasst die Frau wissen, dass ihre Erben dasselbe Schicksal erwartet wie den Kriminellen, denn so will es das Gesetz des Imperators."

languages.text: « Si dame Molles-Secundas a raison, ses enfants sont donc les complices de l'imposteur et ont commis un crime en diffamant l'authenticité d'un document de l'Administratum, {n}déclare Solomorne, qui semble avoir assez de sang-froid pour un régiment entier.{/n} Faites savoir à cette femme que ses héritiers encourent la même peine que le criminel, comme le stipule la loi de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: « Si dame Molles-Secundas a raison, ses enfants sont donc les complices de l'imposteur et ont commis un crime en diffamant l'authenticité d'un document de l'Administratum, {n}déclare Solomorne, qui semble avoir assez de sang-froid pour un régiment entier.{/n} Faites savoir à cette femme que ses héritiers encourent la même peine que le criminel, comme le stipule la loi de l'Empereur. »

« Si dame Molles-Secundas a raison, ses enfants sont donc les complices de l'imposteur et ont commis un crime en diffamant l'authenticité d'un document de l'Administratum, {n}déclare Solomorne, qui semble avoir assez de sang-froid pour un régiment entier.{/n} Faites savoir à cette femme que ses héritiers encourent la même peine que le criminel, comme le stipule la loi de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: “如果莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人说的是实话，那她的孩子们就成了冒牌货的帮凶，他们犯了诽谤内政部文件真实性的重罪。”{n}索罗蒙说话时气势汹汹，几乎比得上整支军团的士兵。{/n}“让那个女人认清事实：她的继承人将会面临与罪犯相同的命运，因为帝皇的律法就是这么规定的。”
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: “如果莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人说的是实话，那她的孩子们就成了冒牌货的帮凶，他们犯了诽谤内政部文件真实性的重罪。”{n}索罗蒙说话时气势汹汹，几乎比得上整支军团的士兵。{/n}“让那个女人认清事实：她的继承人将会面临与罪犯相同的命运，因为帝皇的律法就是这么规定的。”

languages.text: «Si lady Molles-Secundas está en lo cierto, sus hijos son cómplices del impostor y culpables de impugnar la autenticidad de los documentos del Administratum». {n}La sangre fría de Solomorne bastaría para todo un regimiento.{/n} «Haga saber a la mujer que sus herederos sufrirán el mismo castigo que el criminal, como dicta la ley del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: «Si lady Molles-Secundas está en lo cierto, sus hijos son cómplices del impostor y culpables de impugnar la autenticidad de los documentos del Administratum». {n}La sangre fría de Solomorne bastaría para todo un regimiento.{/n} «Haga saber a la mujer que sus herederos sufrirán el mismo castigo que el criminal, como dicta la ley del Emperador».

languages.text: 「もしレディ・モレス・セクンダスの主張が正しいとすれば、彼女の子らは偽者の共犯であり、行政局発行文書の信憑性を貶めた罪に問われることになります」{n}今のソロモーンには、まるで連隊一個分の冷静さが宿っているようだ。{/n}「彼女の相続人も犯罪者と同じ運命をたどることを、この女に知らせるべきでしょう。皇帝陛下の法がそう定めているのですから」
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: 「もしレディ・モレス・セクンダスの主張が正しいとすれば、彼女の子らは偽者の共犯であり、行政局発行文書の信憑性を貶めた罪に問われることになります」{n}今のソロモーンには、まるで連隊一個分の冷静さが宿っているようだ。{/n}「彼女の相続人も犯罪者と同じ運命をたどることを、この女に知らせるべきでしょう。皇帝陛下の法がそう定めているのですから」

languages.text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas haklıysa çocukları, taklitçinin suç ortakları konumuna düşer ve Administratum belgelerinin gerçekliğine leke sürmekten suçlu bulunur." {n}Solomorne, koca bir alayın gösteremediği soğukkanlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kadına, mirasçılarının da suçluyla aynı kaderi paylaşması gerektiğini bildirin. Zira İmparator'un Yasası'nın buyruğu bu şekildedir."
languages.original_text: "If Lady Molles-Secundas is right, then her children are the impostor's accomplices and are guilty of defaming the authenticity of Administratum documents." {n}Now Solomorne has enough sang-froid in him for a regiment.{/n} "Let the woman know that her heirs must face the same fate as the criminal, for so stipulates the Emperor's Law."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas haklıysa çocukları taklitçinin suç ortakları konumuna düşer ve Administratum belgelerinin gerçekliğine leke sürmekten suçlu bulunurlar." {n}Solomorne, koca bir alayın gösteremediği bir soğukkanlılıkla konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Kadına, mirasçılarının da suçluyla aynı kaderi paylaşması gerektiğini bildirin. Zira İmparator'un Yasası'nın buyruğu bu şekildedir."

"Leydi Molles-Secundas haklıysa çocukları sahtekârın suç ortakları konumuna düşerler ve Administratum belgelerinin gerçekliğine leke sürmekten suçlu bulunurlar." {n}Solomorne, koca bir alayın gösteremediği bir soğukkanlılıkla konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Kadına, mirasçılarının da suçluyla aynı kaderi paylaşması gerektiğini bildirin. Zira İmparator'un kanununun buyruğu bu şekildedir."
